TOR

sudo apt-get install tor


//new terminal 
sudo nano /etc/proxychains4.conf

enable dynamite
enable proxy DNS require


sudo service tor start

proxychains4 firefox www.duckduckgo.com


dns leak test



mysql

service mysql start(no need mag dl ng files)

mysql -u root

show databases;

create database (name ng database);

use  (database name ng ginawa mo);

crete table (db name)(name varchar(35).id int











apache2
sudo apt install apache2
sudo service apache2 start (start ng service)
*(check kung nagana) sudo service apache2 status
(check ip address) sudo ifconfig (paste mo ung ip address sa browser)

host webpage
cd /var/www/html


ls

clear

sudo rm -rf *

clear 

ls

sudo nano index.html


enter mo ulit ung ip mo tas ayun meron ka ng webpage.
